article: Hi! I'm Tony. I love weekends! I always get up late on weekends. For breakfast, I only have _ . It's usually an apple. I have a big lunch. After lunch, I like to eat ice-cream. It tastes _ . In the afternoon, I like to _ . I usually play basketball. _ I swim. In the evening, I clean the house  -- I like _ rooms. I always go to bed late, at about 23:00. _ my sister doesn't like weekends. She has a job in a big store and she always _ on weekends. She never goes out _ her friends. She usually gets home from work at 22:00. After taking a shower, she goes to bed . Sometimes she reads in bed. But don't ask her _ she reads. She always falls asleep   after reading one or two pages  .
